Class Card

  • java.lang.Object
    • Card
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Cloneable, Comparable

    public class Card
extends Object
implements Cloneable, Comparable, Serializable
    Card - Core structure class for a card. Contains its properties
    See Also:
